creator: Viktoriya Grabowska
trademark: Armata is a trademark of Sorkin Type Co.
license_desciption: This Font Software is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1. This license is available with a FAQ at: http://scripts.sil.org/OFL
description: Armata is a low contrast sans serif text face. In Aramata we find a mixture of a the familiar shapes and an aesthetic steadiness and strength with a small number of innovative and delicate gestures. Armata can be used in a wide range of sizes.
